title: The Eye of Sauron (2U87)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Shadow: Exert a [Sauron] Orc and spot X burdens to draw X cards (limit 5).
Lore:	”'…he has indeed arisen again and left his hold in Mirkwood and returned to his ancient fastness in the Dark Tower of Mordor.'”
Rarity:	U
